WorkItem.Description:

WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Crash when Chaos Bolt is selected

Comments.Message: Please read and follow the Posting Guidelines. We need the character file where this is happening and the exact steps to replicate the issue, I was not able to repro just by adding Chaos Bolt to the rotation.
The Talent Values (from the Bane talent) were set up wrong. Fixed
